channel.title: CVE Feed for Facebook -- folly
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Facebook -- folly

item.title: CVE-2021-24036|2024-08-03T19:21:17.359Z -- facebook -- folly
item.description: Passing an attacker controlled size when creating an IOBuf could cause integer overflow, leading to an out of bounds write on the heap with the possibility of remote code execution. This issue affects versions of folly prior to v2021.07.22.00. This issue affects HHVM versions prior to 4.80.5, all versions between 4.81.0 and 4.102.1, all versions between 4.103.0 and 4.113.0, and versions 4.114.0, 4.115.0, 4.116.0, 4.117.0, 4.118.0 and 4.118.1.
